title: Type ID title face
content:
This should be easy for me, but i am not quite sure: what is the sans face used to display the titles of the posts within the type ID board ? Thx so much for clearing this up for me.

 [‹ JELLO Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030181311/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14768 "Go to previous forum topic") [Trying to ID a font ... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030181311/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14751 "Go to next forum topic")
author: versa

comments.content: now i just need to find an alternative to Gotham for a client, that isn’t Avenir or Locator ... shame i can’t seem to creat a project budget big enough to purchase Gotham once and for all
Believe me, i hear you. I’ve been coveting both it and Mercury for ages..

Mark Simonson’s Proxima Nova has some of the same ancestors as Gotham.

[http://www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/proximanova.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030181311/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/proximanova.html "http://www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/proximanova.html")
